value.0:
Revised DM wand: (the old player listing function is now carried in the Admin Server Wand - all functions from that wand plus others are under server functions.  The Admin Server wand is now probably ONLY used by PWs).

Now has 4 basic categories:

Player functions (including alignment shift, macro inventory function, gold reporting, and server functions)

Object functions (turn on, turn off, rotate, destroy)  - To target a NON-USABLE object, move next to the object and then activate the wand.  If you don't target a placable it takes the one closest to YOU,   NOT where you target.  (Best I could get)

Change Time of Day and Weather functions.

Tileset effect stuff - Still in infancy and maybe should not be in, but I am working on it and it is getting better by the day.
